headline.main: 8TH ARMY ATTAGKS; Reported Mauling Nazis After Smash Carries Units to Foe's Rear HOLDS ON AT EL ALAMEIN Drive From South Creates a Prospect of Catching Enemy in Crossfire

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, July 2 -- After a pause of a few hours following upon yesterday's heavy attacks, the Axis forces that are invading Egypt launched another fierce assault this afternoon on the British position at El Alamein, seventy miles west of Alexandria, swinging in simultaneously from both the south and the west.
